short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show webpage with unique background image on every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Autosport (www.autosport.com) is the world's most trusted source of motorsport content. When you install the Official Autosport Extension, you will be shown a different motor racing background image behind the Google search bar each time you open a new tab in the Google Chrome browser.
